forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers this morning with overcast skies during the afternoon hours. High 14C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 58F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 58F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
